explore.title: Explore Collections
explore.description: Find below all the collections. You can search for a collections by its name

share.title: Get your share links !
share.description:
Here your links to allow users to access the collection.

Please keep them in a secure place, they will be not printed anymore. If you loose them or you wish to revoke one, you can simply regenerate them in the update page of your collection.

list.title: Explore Collection
list.noData: There are no elements in the collection

description.create: Create a collection to add new attachments, or simply change the title or the description of it.
description.update: Update your collection to add new attachments, or simply change the title or the description of it.

password.label: Passwords
password.description:
Below you can add one or more passwords to your collection. By default, the password name will be generated for you but feel free to change it. The password field is optional, if you didn't provide a password in the field, we will generate a new one on our side.

Please note that you'll never be able to see your passwords. Once submitted, we will generate some share links (one per password) and you must keep them. If you loose them, you can regenerate new ones and revoke existing on the update page of the collection.
password.name: Name of the password

actions.addElement: Add an element to the collection

video.label: Video
video.description: Add a video to the collection

quizz.label: Quizz
quizz.description: Add a quizz to the collection

link.label: Link
link.description: Add a link to the collection

noData.description: If you have the necessary rights you can create a collection below

deleteModal.title: Delete collection
deleteModal.content: Are you sure to delete this collection?
